attributes.action: reject the decision to deport Al Bangura
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Government seems to prefer, by word and deed, to keep convicted killers in this country rather than a hard working sportsman, who has given much to this country, both by deed and money. We the undersigned implore you to reverse the perverse decision made by the Asylum and Immigration Tribunal today, and show some moral and ethical spirit between you and the Home Secretary in ordering an immediate overturn of this order.

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct correspondence with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
